channel.title: The Special King
channel.description:
So I was thinking of an idea that instead of just the regular 3 King Types all the time, they have another type "Special King" which different abilities.
Fool King: Has the same day abilities, Allies is replaced with a Frame and guard is removed. Objective: Get Executed
Scorned King: Has the same abilities as regular king. Has a random target Objective: Get your target executed
Strict King: Allies checks for Royal Blood rather than their faction Objective: Kill all players with the Royal Blood passive
Killer King: Same abilities but with unlimited guards Objective: Wins with the Neutral Killing
Fake King: No night abilities Objective: Survive to the end
Old King: Will spawn with a different neutral class (Peasant) who's goal is to become king Objective: Remain in power until the Peasant dies.
And maybe some more Special King classes, but this is what I thought of for now.

item.description:
These ideas are good if neutral steps up as king. BD and evils will still be the normal kings. This would limit the “nk step up as new king” meta. Atleast NK should become tyrant or crazy king and objective is the same as nk. Crazy king should have somekind of kill with 1 or 2 charges so you really need to safe it to last nights of the game.
Scorn kill would be awesome aswell. You will keep your targets and want to exe them.
Fool king would be ok also.
Inq still wants to kill sorc.I think still good.
Alch/merc would be “normal” neutral king.
Every neutral king (expect “crazy” king) would have only normal king guard at nights. No “special” neut king spawn as first king.
